info.title: Judy Judge API
info.description: This is a API for running Judy Judge.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new Judge and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the Judge with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: Judge with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the Judge with the requested ID.

204.description: Judge with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a Judge and persists changes to storage.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new Problem and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the Problem with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: Problem with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the Problem with the requested ID.

204.description: Problem with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a Problem and persists changes to storage.

get.description: Find the attached Judge of the Problem with the given ID

200.description: Judge attached to Problem with requested ID was found

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new Submission and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the Submission with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: Submission with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the Submission with the requested ID.

204.description: Submission with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a Submission and persists changes to storage.

get.description: Find the attached Problem of the Submission with the given ID

200.description: Problem attached to Submission with requested ID was found
